Articles.Content:
Fuel Transport System for ground base support

These are designed to connect with each other and other crafts that require refueling during Mun Base Operations

http://i.imgur.com/CdjIcl3.png' alt='CdjIcl3.png'>
Nice craft but I think your in the wrong Sub-forum
Thank you Commander Jebidiah, which forum sub do you recommend for screen shots of my work?

If you put them in either a) the spacecraft exchange with download links so people can use your creations or in the general discussion page.

In case you don't know you'll need a file sharing site account like mediafire or dropped to share crafts

glad I could help
Yes the general discussion sounds good for now because I will not be sharing this crafts just yet, thank you!

If you put them in either a) the spacecraft exchange with download links so people can use your creations or in the general discussion page.

In case you don't know you'll need a file sharing site account like mediafire or dropped to share crafts

glad I could help

I've just been through five pages on the general discussion pages and don't see anyone posting screen shots, I think I will keep them here for now
